description: SELECT SNOMED CT code system values describing things that worsen altered mental status
name: HSPC Altered Mental Status Exacerbating Factors Value Set

text.div:
HSPC Altered Mental Status Exacerbating Factors Value Set

SELECT SNOMED CT code system values describing things that worsen altered mental status

Copyright Statement: TBD

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    73595000Stress (finding)
    64572001Disease (disorder)
    279046003Pressure - physical agent (physical force)
    386476006Touch (regime/therapy)
    130989002Sleep deprivation (finding)
    255641001Caffeine (substance)
    39953003Tobacco (substance)
    53041004Alcohol (substance)
    256235009Exercise (observable entity)
    80638004Work-related activity, function (observable entity)
